thread.title: Wings locker room home to MSU vs U-M trash talk
thread.title_full: Wings locker room home to MSU vs U-M trash talk

title: Wings locker room home to MSU vs U-M trash talk
text:
Red Wings locker room home to MSU vs U-M trash talk 5:40 PM, Oct 16, 2015 3 hours ago Previous Next Dylan Larkin (Michigan) and Drew Miller (Michigan State) talk about the rivalry between the Spartans and Wolverines. WXYZ Copyright 2015 Scripps Media, Inc. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten, or redistributed. Show Caption Previous Next 
The trash talk surrounding Saturday's big game between Michigan State and Michigan has extended to the Red Wings locker room. 
Dylan Larkin -- a Michigan alum -- apparently struck a nerve earlier this week while talking trash to Michigan State alum Drew Miller. Larkin wouldn't tell reporters what was said, but he did extend his apologies to Miller for 'crossing the line'. Copyright 2015 Scripps Media, Inc. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten, or redistributed.
